libdominator.Node

License:
Distributed under the terms of the MIT license. Consult the provided LICENSE.md file for details

class Node;
Represents a node in a DOM

this();
Makes a naked node object

this(string tag);
Makes a node with a given tagname

this(T)(string tag, T startPosition);
Makes a node with a given tagname and with the information for the position in the Document

Node setTag(string tag);
Sets the tagname

Node setStartPosition(T)(T position);
Sets the position in the document where this node begins

Node setEndPosition(T)(T position);
Sets the position in the document where this node ends

string getTag();
Attribute[] getAttributes();
void addAttribute(Attribute attribute);
uint getStartPosition();
uint getEndPosition();
Node setStartTagLength(T)(T length);
Node setEndTagLength(T)(T length);
ushort getStartTagLength();
ushort getEndTagLength();
Does what the name says

Node isComment(bool sw);
Markes this node to be inside of a comment

bool isComment();
Returns:
true if the node is marked to be inside of a comment, otherwise false.

void setParent(Node* pNode);
Sets the given node as the parent node

Node getParent();
Does what the name says

void addChild(Node* pNode);
Adds a node as a child node

Node[] getChildren();
Does what the name says

size_t hasChildren();
Returns:
true if the node has children nodes.

bool hasParent();
Returns:
true if the node has a parent node.
